attributes.description:
We offer a premium selection of approved and quality inspected vehicles you can purchase with confidence. All vehicles undergo our OEM mechanical inspection as well as a third-party road worthy certificate upon delivery. We do assist with finance and deliver nationwide to make your experience as effortless as possible. Service/ maintenance plans and mechanical warranties are available for your peace of mind. All trade ins are accepted subject to view. All above services are included in our on the road fees. Contact us today for an unbeatable quote. 
* All specials and discounted stock are subject to in-house finance
* Listed price excludes all fees/costs.

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.description:
Here we have manic styling, mad performance, the   Opel Corsa OPC hot hatch is the ultimate suburban speed racer!
Traction control, auto lights, 
Alloy Wheels, multi-function steering wheel, 
Air conditioner, Electric Windows, Radio, AUX, Bluetooth, 
Air Bags, Side Impact Protection, 
Central Locking, On Board Computer, Cloth interior, 
Security System, Immobiliser, Power Steering, Impact Tensioning Seat Belts, Brakes, ABS, EBD
Hi Level Brake Light, 
Body Coloured Bumpers, 
Body Coloured Mirrors.

Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock.
A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further.
Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!
attributes.title: 2009 Opel Corsa 1.6 OPC
